inclusion.criterion: pain other than right lower abdominal quadrant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinical examination favored perforated acute appendicitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: perforated appendicitis not revealed by pathologic investigation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pelvic inflammatory disease or other gynecologic disease found during laparoscopic examination or diagnosed before operation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the patient declining to enroll in this study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain, nausea, vomiting, fever, and abdominal tenderness. CT scan showed acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis.
